section.title: Purpose of this document
section.para: This document aims at summarizing the requirements for the graphical user interface (GUI) of the BioPreDyn integrated software suite (deliverables 3.4, 7.2 and 8.3). It lists the main specifications for the GUI as expressed by the BioPreDyn consortium members.
This document does not describe the chosen implementation; this will be detailed in the GUI design notes.

section.title: Audience
section.para: This document is primarily intended to developers willing to understand the choices made during the BioPreDyn software suite design stage. It is particularly useful for maintenance and modification purposes.

section.title: Organization
section.para: This guide is divided into four main sections:

formalpara.title: Introduction
formalpara.para: A short introduction to the project context, and how the current document fits in the global picture.

formalpara.title: Requirements
formalpara.para: Description of the main requirements for the BioPreDyn software suite GUI, along with proposals for several components of the interface.

formalpara.title: References
formalpara.para: Material related to the project, and more specifically the GUI design.
